companyName: First Trust Global Tactical Commodity Strategy Fund
description:
The investment seeks to provide total return by providing investors with commodity exposure while seeking a relatively stable risk profile.
 The fund is an actively managed exchange-traded fund ("ETF") that seeks to achieve attractive risk adjusted return by investing in commodity futures contracts and exchange-traded commodity linked instruments (collectively, "Commodities Instruments") through a wholly-owned subsidiary of the fund organized under the laws of the Cayman Islands (the "Subsidiary"). The advisor expects to gain exposure to these investments exclusively by investing in the Subsidiary.
